## TextAreaBuilderOptions.prompt property

Prompt string shown before each line.

**Signature:**

```typescript
prompt?: string;
```

## Remarks

Displayed at the start of each line in the textarea. Uses `promptStyle` for styling. Common patterns include empty string (no prompt), `'| '`<!-- -->, or `'  '` for indentation.
